titles.title: Providing for consideration of the joint resolution (H.J. Res. 38) disapproving the rule submitted by the Department of the Interior known as the Stream Protection Rule.
Providing for consideration of the joint resolution (H.J. Res. 38) disapproving the rule submitted by the Department of the Interior known as the Stream Protection Rule.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 115-6, by Mr. Newhouse.
Rule provides for consideration of H.J. Res. 38 with 1 hour of general debate. Previous question shall be considered as ordered without intervening motions except motion to recommit.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 6.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 70.

POSTPONED PROCEEDINGS - At the conclusion of debate on H. Res. 70, the Chair put the question on ordering the previous question and by voice vote announced that the ayes had prevailed. Mr. Hastings demanded the yeas and nays, and the Chair postponed further proceedings on ordering the previous question until later in the legislative day.
On ordering the previous question Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 236 - 183 (Roll no. 68).

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by recorded vote: 236 - 186 (Roll no. 69).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: Sets forth the rule for consideration of the joint resolution (H.J. Res. 38) disapproving the rule submitted by the Department of the Interior known as the Stream Protection Rule.
